name: Duckcross
description:
Uh no! When Duck Wizard tried to create magic bread to feed his ducklings, it came to life and duck-napped them! Go on a picross adventure to rescue all of them! 

This is a pretty short project, I honestly just really like picross/nonogram and wanted to make one of my own. The game features 5 levels and a boss fight! I appreciate all feedback and constructive criticism!
